Defining URL:https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/ValueSet/UKCore-HumanLanguage
Version:1.0.0
Name:UKCoreHumanLanguage
Definition:

A ValueSet that identifies the language used by a person.

Publisher:NHS Digital
OID:2.16.840.1.113883.2.1.3.2.4.17.70(for OID based terminology systems)
Copyright:

Source Resource:XML / JSON

FHIR Profile(s) referencing this ValueSet:

  • UK Core NHS Communication Extension

UK Core Human Language

A ValueSet that identifies the language used by a person.
